lead_paragraph: FRISHTICK--Edith, 89, long-time resident of NYC, passed away in Richmond, VA on March 19, 2016. Widow of Kenneth, whose death one year prior ended 67 years of loving marriage. Mother of Risa, Julia, and Jonathan, grandmother of six, great-grandmother of four. Lived her dream as a 25 year teacher at PS 139, Queens. Leaves a legacy of devoted family, friends and students. 1/3
